name: NYCNowPodcast
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill allows listeners to access NYC NOW, a podcast of the most up-to-date local news from across New York City and the region. With three updates a day, every weekday, the podcast delivers breaking news from WNYC and Gothamist, top headlines and in-depth coverage. It’s all the news you need to know right now to make New York work for you.
